name: The Compound
description:
Objective: Get through all three levels of The Compound to your freedom! Dodge cops, lasers, and frustration with quick reflexes, a sharp wit and maybe a couple of retrys!

Controls:

  • A/D/Left and Right Arrows - Directional Movement
  • W, S, Up, and Down Arrows - Looking up and down
  • E - Interact (doors, cover)
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Return to hub area
  • CONTROLLER SUPPORT
